text: 10.14 Apo 18.6 Pen bɨ an nɨbop ma agdɨl, takaw nɨbop ma nɨŋɨd dɨnɨmuŋ, nɨbi kal anɨb ak akaŋ taun anɨb ak kelɨg amnɨg, sɨlkul dayday tob nɨbop dup ak wik yokɨl amnɨmɨb agak.10.14 Jisas bɨne sɨlkul dayday tob kɨlop dup ak wik yokɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, binɨb taun anɨb ak kɨli ke nɨgɨnɨgabal, chɨn tap tɨmel gɨpun, anɨgɨl abal ey agɨnɨgabal. Buk Mak 6.11 abe nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
